description: Learn how to cook corned beef, and try this Asian-inspired twist on a slow cooker corned beef recipe.
keywords: Corned beef,Mandarin,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Slow cooker,Beef,Dairy free
name: AsianFlavoured Corned Beef Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion, ginger, garlic and chilli flakes into a 6litre slow cooker. Heat oils together in a small pan over medium heat until hot. Pour into cooker over onion mixture and stir to coat.
Pat beef dry with paper towel. Rub well with five spice powder. Place into cooker on top of onions.

Peel 1 mandarin, divide into segments and shred the peel. Juice remaining mandarin and combine with hoisin, stock and cooking wine in a jug. Pour into cooker around beef. Add mandarin segments and scatter peel over beef. Cover and cook on high setting for 4 hours or until beef is tender.

Remove beef from cooker and cover to keep warm. Strain liquid into a saucepan. Mix cornflour with 1 tbs water until smooth. Add to sauce and bring to a simmer over medium high heat. Cook for 5 minutes or until thickened.
Serve beef with sauce and bok choy topped with sesame seeds.
